metaDescription: In a nod to this distinguished Italian Renaissance building and its Parisian counterparts, Jeffrey Beers juxtaposes classic details-oversized moldings, chevron-patterned oak floors-with contemporary touches for these 169 highly-appointed residences.

intro.title: Romancing Tribeca
intro.para: In a nod to this distinguished Italian Renaissance building and its Parisian counterparts, Jeffrey Beers International juxtaposes classic details-oversized moldings, chevron-patterned oak floors-with contemporary touches for these 152 highly-appointed residences. From the outside, 108 Leonard is historic landmark that pays homage to a gilded bygone era; on the inside, it is a bright canvas of modern restraint, ready to adapt to one's individual lifestyle.

slides.caption: Typical ceiling heights range from approximately 10 to over 14 feet
slides.detail: Original restored windows and five inch wide oak floors bring authentic European glamour to organically flowing layouts. Typical ceiling heights range from 10 to over 14 feet, with premium residence ceiling heights soaring to more than 16 feet.

slides.caption: Each residence has been optimized for space and warmth
slides.detail: Gallery walls are awash in lighting tucked behind recessed coves, offering illuminated spaces for burgeoning art collectors.

slides.caption: Kitchen in Sand Palette
slides.detail: Open-plan kitchens have been thoughtfully conceived in two palettes, sheathed in marble backsplashes and anchored by stunning marble waterfall islands. Sand palette shown here.

slides.caption: Kitchen in Ash Palette
slides.detail: Open-plan kitchens have been thoughtfully conceived in two palettes, featuring top-of-the-line Miele appliances. Ash palette shown here.

slides.caption: Master bath with Calacatta Black feature wall
